channel.title: Can't Start Game Could Not Load Library Client
channel.description:
I've tried everything for the last half hour to get this work. I've copied bin files in all the directories, restarted steam, reinstalling it. Nothing will work. Whatever I do I get the error, "Could not load library client" when it starts. Game is installed in sourcemods, shows up in steam just fine. Source SDK is installed as well as half-life 2.
Anyone know how to actually fix it?
